screenshots.caption: With a notify message after having finished the replay

name: GeditChangelog
short_description:
This is a plugin for the famous text editor "Gedit" (Available for Linux, WIndows, ...?)

When writing a text, GeditChangelog records every character typed. For instance, capture a video of your text creation process.
It adds another dimension of text writing, the time dimension. It is very exciting to experiment with this type of writing.

Since this is a plugin for gedit, any type of text can be tracked: Programming, Writing short or long text, etc.

For a nice visualization, have a look at this youtube video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iFhd7rpbM_M&hd=1

Consider donating to this project: https://sourceforge.net/donate/?user_id=4005050
summary: A Gedit plugin for exact, character based change logging
